content: > please note this pattern is available for free on my blog https //keepcalmandcrochetonuk com/2020/12/23/free-crochet-pattern-christmas-mushroom-tree-ornament/ this downloadable pdf file for sale contains the full pattern without advertisements hanging tree ornaments is definitely one of the highlights of the festive season and this year i ve got a quick satisfying and a bit addictive this year we are making christmas mushrooms apparently the red and white speckled fungi are known in german as gluckspilz which literally means lucky mushroom which i really like and i think we can all do with a little luck to get past 2020 don t you the pattern is available in uk and us terms and includes explanations of all stitches and abbreviations yarn 4ply 125m per 50g ball 100% cotton anchor creativa fino 1 ball in #00258 a red 1 ball in #00926 b cream anchor metallic viscose 80% and metallised polyester 20% 1 ball in #00304 c metallic white you will also need * a yarn needle * stitch markers * toy stuffing * length of twine for hanging hook 3mm us size d/3 finished size 9cm long 3 5 without hanging string if you like this pattern then please come check out my other designs www ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs this pattern is c designed by heather gibbs 2020 and is for personal use only not for resale patterns are not to be copied sold or distributed however you are welcome to donate gift as well as sell any of your finished items if you are an individual crafter if you sell your work online please credit the work as appropriate and link to my pages where you can thank you http //keepcalmandcrochetonuk com http //facebook com/keepcalmandcrochetonuk https //www instagram com/kcaco uk/ http //ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs https //tinyurl com/kcacouk-lovecrafts-com http //pinterest com/kcacouk/ http //twitter com/kcacouk
